EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Opportunity owner and Co-owner when co-owner is changed
EmailTemplate.name: Notification to Opportunity owner and Co-owner when co-owner is changed
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity Co-Owner has been changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: This is to notify you that the Co-Owner of the Opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} has been changed to {!Opportunity.Co_Owner__c}. Link to the above Opportunity: https://hon-aero.my.salesforce.com/{!Opportunity.Id} Note: This email is automatically generated. Please do not reply to this email.
